org.smartfrog.services.jetty.contexts.delegates
Class DelegateServletContext

java.lang.Object
  org.smartfrog.services.jetty.contexts.delegates.DelegateApplicationContext
      org.smartfrog.services.jetty.contexts.delegates.DelegateServletContext
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.rmi.Remote, org.smartfrog.services.www.ApplicationServerContext, org.smartfrog.services.www.ServletContextIntf
public class DelegateServletContext
extends DelegateApplicationContext
implements org.smartfrog.services.www.ServletContextIntf

This is a helper servlet context; it gets stuff delegated to it. It is remotable, but not a Prim-derived class. Destroying this class does not destroy the servlet.
